data.name: OVERPASS™ Yamaha Special Pack
data.detailed_description: The Yamaha Special Pack includes two vehicles built for competitions. The Yamaha YFZ450R SE quad and a Yamaha YXZ1000R buggy specially customized by S3 Power Sports.
data.about_the_game: The Yamaha Special Pack includes two vehicles built for competitions. The Yamaha YFZ450R SE quad and a Yamaha YXZ1000R buggy specially customized by S3 Power Sports.
data.short_description: The Yamaha Special Pack includes two vehicles built for competitions. The Yamaha YFZ450R SE quad and a Yamaha YXZ1000R buggy specially customized by S3 Power Sports.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-3470/AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
